Title: Authorizes the county of Madison to reinstate John R. Murray to a full-time competitive position in the county of Madison sheriff's department
Summary: Authorizes the county of Madison to reinstate John R. Murray to a full-time competitive position in the county of Madison sheriff's department; authorizes the commissioner of the department of civil service to reinstate John R. Murray on the eligible civil service list for employment as a New York police officer.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the county of Madison to reinstate John R. Murray to a full-time competitive position in the county of Madison sheriff's department; and authorizing the commissioner of the department of civil service to reinstate John R. Murray on the eligible civil service list for employment as a New York police officer
